MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have an underground cable fault near Dorchester Place substation and our teams are connecting a generator to the network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 12:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:51PM on Thursday, 01 April 2021.
